title: Eliza hun ropui
lyrics:
Hei a ni zan hun ropui a thu puanin a lo awm a,
A lo thleng dawn si a hun dikna,
Felna, siamthar lehna ni chu;
A serh leh sang awm lo khandaih nen,
Riltam leh tuihal a lo thleng ta,
Mahse, hmun khawhar he thlalerah,
Lalpa kawng sialtute kan ni si a.

A lo kal dawn chhum zingah te khian,
Ni aia engin tawtawrawt ri nen;
Lal Isua chhandamtu a ni,
Hlim takin lawm r'u, aw chhandamna.

A ni e Ezekiela hun chu, ruhro pawh tisain a lo khat,
Hei hi chhiahhlawh Davida hmun chu,
Temple siamthar lehna ni chu;
Buhseng hun kan thleng, lo hawi chhuak la,
Lalpa huan a hmin zo dawn ta e,
A seng khawm tura a mi rawihte kan ni,
Hrilin a thu kan au pui e.

Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova lo lal dang a awm lo,
Jehova lal ropui a ni,
Jehova lo Lal dang a awm lo,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova lo Lal dang a awm lo,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova lo Lal dang a awm lo,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova lo Lal dang a awm lo,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova lo Lal dang a awm lo,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova lo Lal dang a awm lo,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova lo Lal dang a awm lo,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
